title: AlphaEther
author: AlphaEther
content: In many crypto projects, many people get the job of community admin / social media manager / community management. Do you know, how to get these jobs? I tried a lot. I went to many but it didn't work. If anyone knows anything about this please let me know.Â Thanks in advance.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Anthony Pompilano tries to get people jobs in crypto. He runs a website -https://pompcryptojobs.com/
